artist: Artist: Kitagawa Utamaro; Publisher: Published by Tsutaya Jūzaburō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: unsigned double page from a illustrated poem book
inscription:
right:

I am sending you a long, wistful letter 
Written on paper
Rolled up like a coiled snake.
My pent-up passion,
Is as deep as a snake is long

Kaki okuru
Fumi mo toguro wo
Makigami ni
Tsumoru omoi no
Take wa nagamushi
                by Chida Hanamoto

left: 

Because I am so disliked,
My grudge against you, my love,
Has turned me into green lizard
Which crawls around
The Leaves of arrowroot vine

Kirawaruru
Urami ya iro mo
Ao-tokage
Kuzuha naranedo
Hai matouran
                 by Tonya Sakafune
medium: From a woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Skink and Rat Snake
